document_data.name: Garadoc's Camp
document_data.mainbody: '''Garadoc's Camp''' was a small settlement of the [[barbarian]]s of the [[Black Raven Tribe]] in the [[Frost Hills]].
document_data.Activities:
A band of Black Raven [[Uthgardt]] had established a camp on the top of [[Dhaemang's head]], the most southern peak of the [[Frost Hills]]. From this breathtaking view, the Black Ravens spied on surrounding movements and they were able to make sudden attacks against the people of the south. The Black Ravens hunted in the woods and meadows of the Frost Hills.

The camp was the base of operations of a band of raiders. They were mostly warriors with no children; indeed, the barbarians' families were hidden in nearby safer villages.
document_data.Leadership: This camp was ruled by [[Garamel Talonhand]], a female veteran explorer and a bandit who criticized outsiders as weak and decadent.
document_data.Notable inhabitants:
* [[Garamel Talonhand]]
* [[Kelemoc Ravenheart]]
* [[Vagha the Bloody]]
* [[Jomol the Old]]
